Articles.Content:
I've been wanting a bigger nav ball. I seem to let my maneuver nodes stray too far.

I played around in the lander cans and found the IVA is pretty sweet for setting up fine controls.

If I had some maneuver delta-v gadget, I don't think I'd leave IVA mode.

I like how easy it is to line up the perfect shot using the larger nav ball + crosshairs.
Nice, I'll have to do more IVA-only missions. Definitely get more immersion out of those constrained spaces.

A maneuver delta-v gauge, and a timer, would be wonderful in IVA. I agree completely, things are really beautiful from the Mk 1 Landercan. The Cupola module is even better, but it's far too big and heavy to haul up in any normal orbiter of mine

You know about the UI size slider in the settings?

Large works good for me.

MK1 Lander Can IVA is beautiful.

They should do MK2 and MK3 cockpit, would be interesting to see the results.
